content.description: Start on the left side jug, move right to another jug before making a couple long moves on crimps to gain a large incut hold. From here go straight up to top out or move up and right to possibly increase the difficulty a hair, though I haven't done it.
content.protection: 1 pad for the top out and a spotter to follow you from the start as it would be easy for hands to pop off.
content.location: Start on the far left of the boulder on jugs.

content.description: Good moderate! Big moves on jugs to a fairly easy top out
content.location: On the left side of the boulder, start on a good edge at chest height. Move right to the big flake jug, then up, avoiding the tree

content.description: Easy slab warmup, lots of opportunities for eliminates
content.location:
Cracked Egg on the backside of the boulder next to Boulder 2. Easiest to access from on top, drop down some rocks to get to the problem

Start on good edges towards the right side of the boulder. Climb straight up using small edges and the arete.
